user_question: How do coral reefs support marine life, and can you generate an image of a vibrant coral reef ecosystem?
final_answer: Coral reefs provide habitat, food, and protection for a diverse range of marine life. Image of a vibrant coral reef ecosystem generated. Threats to coral reefs include climate change, ocean acidification, overfishing, pollution, and destructive fishing practices.
